properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 16 at 8:42AM PST until January 18 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory today, seas 13 to 16 feet at
12 seconds, easing to 10 to 12 feet this afternoon expected.
For the Gale Watch, south winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 50
kt and seas 13 to 18 feet at 11 seconds possible.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 PM PST this
evening. For the Gale Watch, from Friday afternoon through
Saturday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING
